attributes.action: Remove the UAE from UK’s red list of travel
attributes.additional_details: Because it is the right of every resident or UK national to be able to self-isolate at their own residence rather than a hotel. Additionally, because the UAE is very safe and has handles the COVID-19 outbreak very efficiently.
attributes.background: International Students and UK nationals live in the UAE. Having the UAE on UK’s red list of countries makes it very difficult for us to return, especially those of us with paid apartments who do not have to pay for the hotel £1750 fees.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

To remove the UAE off the ‘Red List’ by the Summer
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575787
